name: Vertraag
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a single-target spell on an enemy, this relic {ACTION_attacks} that enemy.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts its target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}.
The bearer is healed instead of taking damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}.
At the start of battle, this relic afflicts its bearer with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}.
After the bearer takes damage from an attack or spell, the enemy takes damage equal to 1 turn of the bearer's {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} debuff.
The bearer deals 10% additional damage for each enemy afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}.
After the bearer deals damage to an enemy with an attack or spell, the enemy takes additional damage equal to 1 turn of the bearer's {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} debuff.
After the bearer is killed, it deals damage to enemies equal to 5 turns of its {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} debuff.
This relic and its bearer deal additional damage to enemies equal to 10% of the damage they've taken from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} in the current battle.
After the bearer is killed, it is resurrected with 20% {STAT_health} if it is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}. This effect can activate a maximum of 3 times per battle.
title: God of Time
